title: Leveraging Wastewater Surveillance for Managing the Spread of SARS-CoV-2 and Concerned Pathogens during FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022
content:
Publication date: Available online 26 April 2024

Source: Heliyon

Author(s): Shimaa S. El-Malah, Jayaprakash Saththasivam, Arun K. K, Khadeeja Abdul Jabbar, Tricia A. Gomez, Sara M.
